name: Artifact Annihilation
description:
Artifact annihilation is a game where the government is going to repossess your items soon and if you don’t destroy all of your illegal artifacts too you might get caught! There is a speed run timer included in the game so try to beat your best time!

YES IT SAVES YOUR PROGRESS!!!

IMPORTANT:If the game looks funky/weird change your window size to make it look normal.

This game was made for the Spring Clicker Jam 2023

Have fun playing!

Credits:

Music: made in garage band

Sound effects: made with sfxr

Art: made with piskel

Game: Made By MrCoder68
